vote.title: Vote on me

Thank you so much. You can vote on me using the link down below

[top.gg](https://top.gg/bot/481282441294905344/vote)

invite.canAddMe:
You can invite me to your Discord server by clicking [here](https://discord.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id={{0}}&scope=bot%20applications.commands&permissions=8560045566).
Don't forget to vote me by clicking [here](https://top.gg/bot/481282441294905344/vote)

Do you need help? Join my support server by clicking [here](https://discord.gg/Jr57UrsXeC). Thank you and see you later.
